ï»¿I FFOCAL '' RECOMMENDATION OF STATUTORY COMMITTEE TO: The President, International Development Association Recommendation of the Committee under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Credit (Improving Employability and Labor Inccme of Youth Project) to the Plurinational State of Boliv. a. The undersigned Commiltee constituted under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of International Development Association (the Association) hereby submits its recommendation pursuant to said Section in respect of the proposal that the Association grant to the Plurinational State of Bolivia (the Recipient) a credit in an amount equivalent to SDR 13,000,000. The purpose o said credit is to improve employability and labor income of poor youth by supporting the expansio: of the skills development programs in selected cities. 1. The Committee has carefully studied the merits of the proposal to grant such a credit, and of the purpose to which the proceeds of tie credit are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of the opinion that the Project toward the financing of which the proceeds of such credit are to be applied come; within the purposes of the Association as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said Project is designed to promote the economic development of the Plurinational State of Bolivia anl is of high developmental priority in the light of the needs of the Plurinational State of Bolivia.
ï»¿-2- (Plurinational State of Bolivia) (Improving Employability and Labor Income of Youth Project) 3. Accordingly, the Committee finds that said Project merits financial assistance from the Association, and hereby recommends said Project for such assistance. COMMITTEE Senior Vice President and Group Genera Counsel Nominee Selec y Governor for Plurinational State of Bolivia Regional Vice President Latin America and the Caribbean Dated at Washington, D. C.
